STARTER: Do you have any hobbies you like to spend time on? How did you get into them, and what keeps you interested?
text:
[Starter]: Do you have any hobbies you like to spend time on? How did you get into them, and what keeps you interested?
[Student]: I was always the same as before in school
[Teacher]: , but since graduating I've had a lot of free time, and I'm feeling a bit lost.
